Name: 东湖塘历险记/East Lake Pond

You need to click the left and right directions to control the role, and prevent being entrusted to squeeze to death, fall to death and other strange death games. The mysterious underground world is in constant danger and awaits the conquest of the warriors. In the world of layers, stick to the last moment! Game features: 1.
